A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Story was terrible!  Who the hell wrote this story and script? Action was fine but it just wasn't Star Wars!  The story\, character development was just weak.    I was hoping for so much with Luke\, Reyes and other characters.  This production looked rush and acting was a bit cheesy.  Not impressed at all.  I was disappointed and think I could have a wrote a better 2nd story.
